StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Having 5 years of experience in Telecom and Network Infrastructure administration , S8720 Avaya Media Server, G650 Media Gateway, G3SI EPBX, Avaya IP Phones 4602SW, 4610SW, 4621SW, PRI Lines, Lease Line(45 mbps each), DS-2 Links, ISDN Connection, Polycom VSX 7000, 5000, View Station 128 EX and View Station 128 & Tandberg 1000 MXP, Switch Port Security and VLAN, VOIP Phone., Switching and Routing , Worked to Manage L2 & L3 Cisco Switches and Cisco Routers, LAN/WAN etc.

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Mahesh Kumawat is a resident of New Delhi, Delhi, IN. He has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 10 years. During his last employment he was working as a Network Engineer/System Engineer at CMS Info Systems Pvt. Ltd. Mahesh has extensive knowledge of DS1, Cisco Switches/Routers, LAN/WAN, VoIP (Voice over IP), TFTP, Router, OSPF (Open Shortest Path First), Media Gateway, LAN/WAN > WAN, LAN/WAN > VLAN, ISDN, DS3, Remedy, RIP, Microsoft Outlook, Microsoft Exchange Server, Microsoft Exchange 2003, Lotus Notes/Domino, IP, IGRP, Dynamic Host Control protocol, Domain Name Server Protocol, DS2, Cisco Switches/Routers > Catalyst Switches, AD. So far Mahesh has not gained any managerial experience.
